text: Amasung hi adu nungsitka maiyoknaba maramna Ibungogi tung-inbasingna yamna wana hi honbadu Ibungona ure. Maram aduna nongngallamdai pung ahumdagi ayukki pung taruk phaobagi manunggi pungpham amada, Ibungona makhoi tamna ising mathakta khongna lakle. Amasung Ibungona makhoibu hendoktuna chatnaba tourammi.
